page.title: 13Cloverville Nurseries.
page.content: Cloverville Nurseries is a market garden owned by Michael Fletcher. He farms 20 acres and grows glasshouse crops, salads, brassicas, rootcrops ,soft fruits, bush fruits, Christmas trees & a few flowers.This is typical l of this area. In his job he uses tractors, ploughs, rotavators, hoes, planters, rollers & irrigation sprays. He works a long, hard day all year round. In summer he works 16 hrs. and in winter 8 to 9. He employs 3 people regularly, & 3 more for seasonal work. He sells his produce to 6 shops, and to Hampshire Growers Co-op. He also supplies Pick your own. His family are involved with his work but he doesn't want his children to take over because it is a dieing business. In his small amount of spare time he is involved with the Young Farmers Ass and cubs and scouts.
